about_the_game:
Get an EPIC boost to your power with this awesome set of items for Drosenthes! You get two rare pieces of gear and an exclusive Golden Epic, plus you unlock Drosenthes if you don't already own them! And as a bonus, we'll toss in 3000 Common Materials!

This pack includes:
  • Drosenthes (if you don't already own them)
  • Their Superconductive Leaf of Sublimation Golden Epic
  • Their Drosenthes Nectar and Scrumptious Lizard gear
  • 3000 Common Crafting materials
